name: Tokkyū Shirei Solbrain - Remake
description:
Tokkyū Shirei Solbrain - Remake

Hello!

This is a remake of the Famicom game Tokkyū Shirei Solbrain.

It's not finished, I've only done the first stage with some weapons and the first boss. I've made some small changes to the game.

It was created to learn some GameMaker Studio codes.

Controls:

MOVE: ARROW KEYS (LEFT STICK OR D-PAD)

JUMP: D (XB GAMEPAD A)

PUNCH: S (XB GAMEPAD X)

Thanks for playing!
